clothing_items.fabric: polished steel with gold and green enamel detailing
clothing_items.details: Full suit of articulated plate armor, including a breastplate, pauldrons, rerebraces, vambraces, gauntlets, faulds, cuisses, poleyns, greaves, and sabatons. The armor is decorated with intricate gold and green enamel designs. Leather straps and buckles secure the various components. A chainmail skirt is visible beneath the faulds.
A padded tunic worn under the armor, made from a rich red brocade fabric with gold floral patterns. The tunic has a high collar and long sleeves, visible at the neck and wrists.
Various leather straps and buckles are used to secure the armor pieces together. These straps are visible at the shoulders, waist, and legs.
Simple leather boots are worn under the sabatons, providing additional comfort and protection.
